data.title: The Etobicoke Connection Inc. - Toronto, Ontario
data.meta_description:
3 Faves for The Etobicoke Connection Inc. from neighbours in Toronto, Ontario. We’re a little different from many others in that, our focus isn’t on  the classic definition of “seniors” as much as it is on those in the age 50+ category.  This demographic is growing in size, it is also more technologically savvy and more active as well.  This is a different demographic today, and it demands more!  

So, our focus is rather unique, with a local focus entirely on the residents and the  economy of Etobicoke, and providing them with a convenient and safe place for relevant information, insight, entertainment, advocacy,  engagement and above all connection.  

That said, a lot of people outside of Etobicoke are going to love us as well!

Our member audience is the individual, the couple, the family, the friends and this community, and connecting them all.   We’re a great resource, a great gift and at a great price!!
